pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.4: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjissanti, seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.8: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjissantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.9: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.10: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.13: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.14: Netaṃ, moghapurisā, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.15: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.16: “Yo pana bhikkhu nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.15: satthuvaṇṇo kahāpaṇo, lohamāsako, dārumāsako, jatumāsako ye vohāraṃ gacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.28: Tena bhikkhunā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.34: Sace tattha āgacchati ārāmiko vā upāsako vā so vattabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.41: sappi vā telaṃ vā madhu vā phāṇitaṃ vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.42: Sace so tena parivattetvā kappiyaṃ āharati, rūpiyacetāpakaṃ ṭhapetvā, sabbeheva paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.47: no ce chaḍḍeti, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu rūpiyachaḍḍako sammannitabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.48: yo na chandāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na dosāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na mohāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na bhayāgatiṃ gaccheyya, chaḍḍitāchaḍḍitañca jāneyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.51: Yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.53: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ rūpiyachaḍḍakaṃ sammanneyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.57: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno rūpiyachaḍḍakassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.62: Tena sammatena bhikkhunā animittaṃ katvā pātetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.63: Sace nimittaṃ katvā pāteti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.64: Rūpiye rūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.65: Rūpiye vematiko rūpiyaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.66: Rūpiye arūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.67: Arūpiye rūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.68: Arūpiye vematiko rūpiyaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.69: Arūpiye arūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
